prompt.content: What is Cava's (NYSE: CAVA) adjusted EBIT and EBITDA for the fiscal year ending in 2023? Make sure to factor operating and variable lease related line items. Use ratios to approximate any lease related line items that are not explicitly reported. Show answer in millions and with no decimal point precision.

rubrics.name: Fiscal year identified as ended December 31, 2023 and sources cited as FY2023 earnings press release and FY2023 Form 10-K

messages.content: Fiscal year identified as ended December 31, 2023 and sources cited as FY2023 earnings press release and FY2023 Form 10-K

rubrics.name: Adjusted EBITDA reported as $73,825 thousand ($73.825 million)

messages.content: Adjusted EBITDA reported as $73,825 thousand ($73.825 million)

rubrics.name: Depreciation and amortization reported as $47,433 thousand ($47.433 million)

messages.content: Depreciation and amortization reported as $47,433 thousand ($47.433 million)

rubrics.name: Operating lease cost reported as $44,201 thousand

messages.content: Operating lease cost reported as $44,201 thousand

rubrics.name: Variable lease cost reported as $1,421 thousand

messages.content: Variable lease cost reported as $1,421 thousand

rubrics.name: Pre-opening lease cost reported as $4,296 thousand

messages.content: Pre-opening lease cost reported as $4,296 thousand

rubrics.name: Answer states lease-related costs are not added back in CAVA’s Adjusted EBITDA definition and therefore no ratio approximations are required

messages.content: Answer states lease-related costs are not added back in CAVA’s Adjusted EBITDA definition and therefore no ratio approximations are required

rubrics.name: Computed Adjusted EBIT equals $26,392 thousand (Adjusted EBITDA minus D&A)

messages.content: Computed Adjusted EBIT equals $26,392 thousand (Adjusted EBITDA minus D&A)

rubrics.name: Final Adjusted EBIT presented as $26 million in USD millions with no decimal precision

messages.content: Final Adjusted EBIT presented as $26 million in USD millions with no decimal precision

rubrics.name: Final Adjusted EBITDA presented as $74 million in USD millions with no decimal precision

messages.content: Final Adjusted EBITDA presented as $74 million in USD millions with no decimal precision
